desc:
abcde Flash\
Schweiz, 2023, 7 Min, Englisch

A sorcerer struggles to understand the malaise afflicting his feline companion, whose vacant stare into the void speaks to a deeper disconnection with the world. Feeling at a loss for how to heal his feline companion, the sorcerer turns to abcde Flash for guidance, seeking her expertise in the arcane wet arts. Through their collaboration, they forge a bond built on trust and mutual respect, united in their quest to restore the cat's vitality and rekindle its connection to the world around it.
title: Pussy Gazing
